io.smudgr.util.source

Interface AnimatedSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Source
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Gif

    public interface AnimatedSource
extends Source
    The AnimatedSource interface defines behavior for manipulating the playback speed for a source that is changing frames in time with the application.

    This allows a source to be slowed down or sped up arbitrarily.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the playback speed multiplier for this AnimatedSource

      Sets the playback speed multiplier for this AnimatedSource
